ygData.subject: RE: Anti-Camping ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Other side of water ? .. I haven t ventured far enough into Najena to get to her. So is there water in the cave  part? or is there another location elsewhere ?
ygData.messageBody:
Other side of water ? .. I haven't ventured far enough into Najena to get to
her. So is there water in the cave part? or is there another location
elsewhere ? I know that we are headed to get the FBR by the weekend.. so if
there is 2 spots any information would be nice

Also, Wht other rare items are in the dungeon ? I know of the boots, RBR,
backpack ?

-----Original Message-----
From: WAMPIR@... [mailto:WAMPIR@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 10, 1999 9:43 AM
To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Anti-Camping ?


From: WAMPIR@...

I have heard of people camping for the jboot for 6hours a day for over a
week
b4 they got one. The FBR is easy compaired to the boots. Najena almost
always
spawns with it. However she doent alwasy spawn. Sometimes a Elmental spawns
in her place, and no there is no such thing as Anticamping code. When me and
My group whent for the robes we tested it out. She spawned just as many
times
when we were on the other side of the water as she did when we were camping
at her doorstep. That anicamping is a legioned not based on facts. Caused
because some Npc's dont always spawn in fact they spawn randomly. so people
started camping on the other side and poof she disided to show up that
time... and thus the legioned was born.
